item.title: Puppet Error - Could not file class in namespace - [solved]
item.description:
Yet another silly error message... that is nowhere near accurate. So if you get the following error one of the possible mistakes would be a missing curly bracket. Yea, I wasted an hour on this one. ppsshh

err: Could not retrieve catalog: Could not find class php in namespaces standardbuild at /etc/puppet/manifests/templates.pp:15 on domain.internal.com
